DialogueNode.Text: You are the therapist everyone is talking about, right?

DialogueOption.Text: Okay, let me look at your history... No previous mental illness... hmm...
Alright, what's wrong? Tell me about your problem.
Damn you looked trashed. Have you been drinking?

DialogueNode.Text: I have a freaking headache. It hurts so much that I can't sleep.

DialogueOption.Text: Alright. Can you tell me more about this headache so I can help you?
Wow. Headache is like totally drunk dude.

DialogueNode.Text: It's my head. It's killing me. I can't sleep cus it hurts so much.

DialogueOption.Text: Alright. Can you tell me more about this headache so I can help you?
Wow. Headache is like totally drunk dude.

DialogueNode.Text: What? No. I am just having a strange headache.

DialogueOption.Text: Alright. Can you tell me more about this headache so I can help you?
Wow. Headache is like totally drunk dude.

DialogueNode.Text: It feels like everything in my head is loose and is trying to escape.

DialogueOption.Text: Alright, then. Let's try this. I think this will help.

DialogueNode.Text: It feels like there are monsters that bangs on my head every time I try to sleep.

DialogueOption.Text: Alright, then. I think this will help you.

DialogueNode.Text: Hey this is serious! I can't even sleep because of this.

DialogueOption.Text: Alright, alright... geez. I think this will help you.
